com.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.nms

Interface PacketHandler


  • public interface PacketHandler
    The interface used for NMS modules for custom implementations of each server version. It is useful for sending map packets to certain players when displaying map pixels.

    • Method Summary
